statements: SELECT * FROM wind_turbine_performance WHERE id = 1;
SELECT turbine_id, production_data FROM wind_turbine_performance WHERE maintenance_status = 'Operational';
SELECT id, production_data, operating_hours FROM wind_turbine_performance ORDER BY operating_hours DESC;
SELECT maintenance_status, operation_hours FROM wind_turbine_performance WHERE production_data > 1000;
SELECT * FROM wind_turbine_performance WHERE turbine_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND maintenance_status = 'Under Maintenance';
SELECT id, turbine_id, production_data, maintenance_status, operating_hours FROM wind_turbine_performance;
SELECT * FROM wind_turbine_performance WHERE production_data > 1000 ORDER BY operating_hours DESC;
SELECT id, turbine_id, maintenance_status FROM wind_turbine_performance WHERE operating_hours < 500 ORDER BY turbine_id ASC;
SELECT production_data, operating_hours, maintenance_status FROM wind_turbine_performance WHERE production_data BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT turbine_id, production_data, maintenance_status FROM wind_turbine_performance WHERE maintenance_status = 'Under Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM WindTurbinePerformanceData;
SELECT turbine_name, location FROM WindTurbinePerformanceData WHERE last_inspection_date IS NULL;
SELECT turbine_id, location FROM WindTurbinePerformanceData ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type='routine' AND maintenance_date='2022-10-15';
SELECT turbine_id, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY turbine_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbinePerformanceData;
SELECT turbine_name, location FROM WindTurbinePerformanceData ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT maintenance_id, turbine_name, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule JOIN WindTurbinePerformanceData ON MaintenanceSchedule.turbine_id = WindTurbinePerformanceData.turbine_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT turbine_name, location, last_inspection_date, last_maintenance_date FROM WindTurbinePerformanceData WHERE last_inspection_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_inspection_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbine;
SELECT location FROM WindTurbine WHERE turbine_id = 1;
SELECT turbine_id, efficiency, power_output FROM TurbinePerformance ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'inspection';
SELECT turbine_id, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'repair' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbine WHERE turbine_id = 1;
SELECT location, production_data->>'manufacturer' AS manufacturer FROM WindTurbine WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM TurbinePerformance WHERE efficiency > 0.75 ORDER BY power_output DESC;
SELECT turbine_id, COALESCE(temperature, 0) AS temperature FROM TurbinePerformance WHERE temperature IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbine;
SELECT model_name, location FROM WindTurbine WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TurbineSensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT turbine_id, wind_speed, power_output FROM TurbineSensorData WHERE wind_speed > 10;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE availability < 0.9;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbine;
SELECT model_name, location, commission_date FROM WindTurbine ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT t.sensor_id, t.turbine_id, t.timestamp, t.wind_speed, p.efficiency FROM TurbineSensorData t JOIN PerformanceMetrics p ON t.turbine_id = p.turbine_id WHERE t.wind_speed > 10;
SELECT ts.sensor_id, ts.timestamp, ts.power_output, m.task FROM TurbineSensorData ts JOIN MaintenanceSchedule m ON ts.turbine_id = m.turbine_id WHERE ts.power_output < 500;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_turbines, AVG(availability) AS avg_availability FROM PerformanceMetrics GROUP BY turbine_id HAVING AVG(availability) > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines;
SELECT location, date_installed, manufacturer FROM WindTurbines WHERE turbine_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM TurbineMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, technician FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE turbine_id = 5;
SELECT location, temperature, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND timestamp < '2021-01-31';
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines;
SELECT location, manufacturer, capacity FROM WindTurbines WHERE capacity > 3.0;
SELECT turbine_id, manufacturer, date_installed FROM WindTurbines ORDER BY date_installed DESC;
SELECT t.location, m.metric_name, m.metric_value, m.timestamp FROM WindTurbines t JOIN TurbineMetrics m ON t.turbine_id = m.turbine_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
